title: Gold prices in Pakistan inch downward with slight drop
description: The price of 24-karat gold in Pakistan reached Rs214,000 per tola, while 10 grams of 24-karat gold were priced at Rs183,471. Moreover, the rate of 22-karat gold in Pakistan reached Rs196,167 per tola, while 10 grams of 22-karat gold were stood at Rs168,182. It’s important to note that gold rates in Pakistan can fluctuate multiple […]

title: IRSA releases 107,100 cusecs water
description: Indus River System Authority (IRSA) on Sunday released 107,100 cusecs water from various rim stations with inflow of 51,000 cusecs. title: Pakistan’s cotton production increases by 82 pc
description: Pakistan registers an 82 percent increase in cotton production as compared to last year, the Pakistan Cotton Ginners Association said on Saturday. title: Introduction of PayPal to boost Pakistan tech ecosystem

title: China’s Urban passenger trips soar 16.7 pc in first three quarters
description: China’s urban public transport logged robust growth in the first three quarters of this year, with the number of passenger trips jumping 16.7 percent year on year, official data showed. description: Pakistan’s Hamza Omar Saeed grabbed the silver medal at the Combaxx Asian Taekwondo Open finals on Sunday. title: Alvi should be in Attock Jail: JUI-F

title: Guinea dictator escapes from jail
description: Gunmen stormed the main prison in Guinea’s capital early Saturday and freed former dictator Moussa “Dadis” Camara, the country’s justice minister said, announcing the closure of the West African nation’s borders. The announcement by Justice Minister Charles Alphonse Wright came several hours after heavy gunfire erupted in the Kaloum district of the capital, Conakry.—Reuters
